name: Dyno Racing
description:
Get ready for the ultimate car tuning experience with Dyno Master! Take your ride to the dyno service and put your tapping skills to the test as you generate income and upgrade your car.

Tap and hold to rev up your engine and generate income, but be careful! Your engine might overheat if you push it too hard. Release the throttle to cool it down and keep it running smoothly. Use the income you generate to upgrade your car and unlock new vehicles.

But that's not all! Once you've upgraded your car, you can enter thrilling races against other cars or try to beat your own records in time trials. Show off your skills and see how far you can go in this addictive and challenging game.

Download now and start your engines!
